mapper.select: select id, (SELECT name FROM h_org_department WHERE id = JSON_UNQUOTE(dept -> '$[0].id')) as deptName, dept,numAll1,numAll2,numMhAll,if(numlgbzCar,1,0)+if(numgsbzCar,1,0)+if(numqtbzCar ,1,0) as numBianchen, ifnull(numlebzSq,0)+ifnull(numgsbzSq,0) + ifnull(numqtbzSq,0) as numSq, numChuqiang,numGsHigh,numGsWidth,heigth from i4h9w_zhiqingshili where dept =#{deptId} order by createdTime desc limit 1
